title: Hard to clean
body: Whatever I fry in this air fryer, it gets stuck on the container, and becomes very hard to wash it off

title: Difficult to remove stains
body: Just after using this product 2 times, the container got stained badly

title: Long Lasting
body: I have been using this product for over an year now. Still works perfectly

title: Good Quality
body: Its been 6 months, and still the product works as promised

title: Easy cleanup
body: Removable crumb tray makes wiping out grease much easier

title: Basket peeling
body: Nonstick basket started peeling after 5 months of use

title: Timer helps
body: Timer is loud and shuts off the heater automatically

title: Small capacity
body: Good for 1-2 servings; cramped for family meals

title: No preheat alert
body: Wish it had a preheat chime; there is none

title: Auto-shutoff glitch
body: One time the heater stayed on after the timer ended; unplugging fixed it

title: Smoky
body: Smokes when cooking bacon; had to open windows

title: Helpful booklet
body: Recipe booklet that comes with it is handy for quick snacks

title: Fast heat
body: Preheats in under 3 minutes; no dedicated alert sound

title: Loud fan
body: Fan is loud on max; acceptable on medium

title: Good for couples
body: Perfect size for two portions; too small for batch cooking
